alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Camden, southern Glynn, southeastern Brantley, east central Ware and northern Charlton Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Waynesville to near Stephen Foster State Park. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Folkston, Woodbine, Dock Junction, Homeland, Hickox, Country Club Estates, Sea Island and Race Pond. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northern Ware
